column4: Hello, I can't remove or update rhythmbox, what should I do, Ubuntu 8.04, the error log: http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/ymE23j7L
does running the command "sudo apt-get -f install" help?
It has the same error. I paste it at http://ubuntu.pastebin.com/8eb1J2hP
hope someone has an answer for you - as I certainly don't :(  Good luck man.
